mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bid (user_id, product_id, bid_price, bid_date) VALUES (#{bidUserId}, #{productId}, #{bidPrice}, #{bidDate})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as bidUserId, product_id as productId, bid_price as bidPrice, bid_date as bidDate FROM bid WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY bid_price DESC LIMIT 1
